#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#define LL long long
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	string s;
	LL n,k;
	cin>>n>>k;
	cin>>s;
	char *f;
	f=new char[k+1];
	LL x=0;
	for(LL i=0;i<(k);i++)
	{
		LL as=0,bs=0,cs=0;
		int flag;
		for(LL j=0;j<(n/k);j++)
		{
			if(s[j*k+i]=='a')
			{
				as++;
				if(j==0)
				flag=1;
			}
			if(s[j*k+i]=='b')
			{
				bs++;
				if(j==0)
				flag=2;
			}
			if(s[j*k+i]=='c')
			{
				cs++;
				if(j==0)
				flag=3;
			}
		}
		if(as>=bs && as>= cs)
		{
			if(flag==1)
			{
				if(as>=bs || as>=cs)
				f[x++]='a';
				flag=0;
			}
			else
			f[x++]='a';
		}
		else
		if(bs>=as && bs >=cs)
		{
			if(flag==2)
			{
				if(bs>=as || bs>=cs)
				f[x++]='b';
				flag=0;
			}
			else
			f[x++]='b';
		}
		else
		if(cs>=as && cs >=bs)
		{
			if(flag==3)
			{
				if(cs>=as || cs>=bs)
				f[x++]='c';
				flag=0;
			}
			else
			f[x++]='c';
		}
	}
	f[x]='\0';
	cout<<f;
	return 0;
}
